title: This thing keeps impressing me! - Alienware AW2723DF
description: Communicative effectively with the right tone at work! Sign up for an account and get 20% off Grammarly Premium:   Plouffe is a big fan of Alienware's monitors, and their new AW2723DF looks like it could be another great addition to the lineup, but do the specs live up to the actual gaming experience?  Buy an Alienware AW2723DF:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 What a time to be alive! 0:48 Unboxing and specs 1:37 Horst reads Plouffe like a book 2:15 Alienware used to be cool 2:46 What else is in the box? 3:15 Unboxing Tech Tip 3:36 RGB, Ports, and stand adjustments 5:37 Sponsor - Grammarly 6:23 Plouffe tries to defend his purchase 6:38 Going through the settings 8:59 Thoughts on HDR ft. Horst 9:50 Gaming impressions 11:29 UFO Test 12:28 Overall thoughts 13:20 Outro
